project.body: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

about.title: Know Who I'M
about.body2: I completed my engineering program in artificial intelligence and computer vision at the University of Electricity
about.body3: Besides coding, I also enjoy doing some other activities!
about.vung: I'm Le Van Vung 23 years old

projected.body: Here are some projects I have worked on:

projects.title: Skin Disease Detection with AI
projects.description: Belle AI helps users identify and learn about skin diseases using AI technology.

projects.title: Belle CMS System
projects.description: A CMS system for managing content for the official Belle AI website.

projects.title: Annotation Tool for Skin Diseases
projects.description: A tool for annotators to create high-quality datasets for skin disease detection.

projects.title: WGHN CMS for Mobile App
projects.description: A social network for golfers with features like booking, messaging, and tournament viewing.

projects.title: Insurance Website for Golfers
projects.description: A website for golfers to easily purchase HIO insurance packages with a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: WGHN Web Chat
projects.description: A web chat platform for users to communicate without downloading the WGHN app.
